def_cn: (家具、服装、房屋装修等)俗气的，难看的，没品位的
def_en: If you describe something such as furniture, clothing, or the way that a house is decorated as tasteless, you consider it to be vulgar and unattractive.

def_cn: (话语、玩笑等)粗俗的，不雅的，不得体的
def_en: If you describe something such as a remark or joke as tasteless, you mean that it is offensive.

def_cn: (食物、饮料)淡而无味的，没滋味的
def_en: If you describe food or drink as tasteless, you mean that it has very little or no flavour.
